MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Wardie Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:14PM. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Easter Hallhill substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:16PM on 27 October 2020.
